name: Ghost Guster
description:
It was just doing normal ghost things, like cleaning up it's dungeon, when it was attacked by other ghosts! Use the arrow keys or WASD to move, and Z or the Mouse to use your handy vacuum to suck up those ghosts! Each different colored ghost moves in a different way. Use Enter to pause and navigate menus, and try to get a high score!

Made for the Halloween Jam 2021 using Godot, Piskel, BFXR, Beepbox, and my vacuum.
